name: Moff Tarkin, Death Star Commandant
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots.  Deploys -2 to Death Star.  Your Force generation at Eriadu is +2.  Superlaser fires at starships for free, and targets it hits are forfeit -4.  Wherever you have an Imperial, you may initiate battles for free.  Immune to attrition < 3.',
